Package com.rift.coad.lib.httpd

Class Summary
CookieWrapper This class is responsible for wrapping the access to the cookie information containied within, and for parsing cookie headers.
HttpDaemon The class responsible for controlling the http interface into Coadunation.
HttpRequestCookieManager This class is responsible for managing the cookies sent between server and browser and browser and server.
HttpRequestManager This object is responsible for queuing the http requests.
HttpServiceHandler This object is responsible for handling the HTTP service requests.
MimeTypes This class defines the MIME encoding types.
Request This class is responsible for handling a request.
RequestListenerThread This class is responsible for monitoring all incoming HTTP connections and than passing of to the http request processing objects.
 

Exception Summary
HttpdException This exception is thrown if an error occurs while dealing with the httpd libraries.
